text: (aur yaad karo) jab tum chadhe (bhaage) ja rahe the aur kisee kee or mudakar nahin dekh rahe the aur rasool tumhen tumhaare peechhe se pukaar[1] rahe the, to (allaah ne) tumhen shok ke badale shok de diya, taaki jo tumase kho gaya aur jo dukh tumhen pahuncha, usapar udaaseen na ho tatha allaah usase soochit hai, jo tum kar rahe ho
